personal.name: Anton Chamorro
personal.title: Frontend Developer
personal.summary: Passionate about building modern and scalable interfaces using Angular and web technologies.
about: I am a full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience creating modern, scalable web applications and SaaS platforms. My expertise includes building intuitive front-end interfaces with React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and SwiftUI, as well as developing robust back-end systems with Spring Boot, Node.js, Express, and Supabase.

I specialize in integrating powerful technologies like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, OpenAI API, and Mapbox API to create seamless user experiences. With a strong focus on efficiency and scalability, I leverage tools such as Docker, AWS, Git, and Stripe to streamline workflows, deployment, and payments.
Driven by curiosity and a commitment to excellence, I am passionate about delivering impactful digital solutions, building both web and mobile experiences, and continuously improving my skills.
